kurumi:DefaultUncommonSkill.NAME: A Better Defend
kurumi:DefaultUncommonSkill.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Plated Armor. Affected by Dexterity.

kurumi:DefaultRareSkill.NAME: For Each Loop x2
kurumi:DefaultRareSkill.DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! Vulnerable to all enemies, 2 times.
kurumi:DefaultRareSkill.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! Vulnerable to all enemies, 3 times.

kurumi:DefaultRarePower.NAME: In-Progress Form
kurumi:DefaultRarePower.DESCRIPTION: At the start of your turn, play a TOUCH.

kurumi:DefaultAttackWithVariable.NAME: Special Strike
kurumi:DefaultAttackWithVariable.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage [E] times. NL (Deal !kurumi:ENERGY_DAMAGE! damage total.)

kurumi:DefaultSecondMagicNumberSkill.NAME: Cool 2 Number Card
kurumi:DefaultSecondMagicNumberSkill.DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! Vulnerable and !kurumi:SecondMagic! poison to an enemy.
